choices.name: Defend
choices.tip: Protect yourself and all players standing at the same building as you.  You will all take less damage.  Only on player can do this per building.

choices.name: Build
choices.tip: Build or repair the building you're at.  This can upgrade buildings.  No more than 2 players can do this at a building each turn.

choices.name: Harvest
choices.tip: Extract resources from the building you're at.  What is extracted depends on the building type.  Buildings have limits on how many players can harvest from them per turn.  No more than 3 players can do this at a building each turn.

choices.name: Activate
choices.tip: Use the special ability of the building you're at.  Depending on the building, this might require that it is built and charged.  This might require more than one player to work, depending on the kind of building.

choices.name: Assist
choices.tip: Aid other players who are harvesting, building, or activating at the same building as you.  Only on player can do this per building.

choices.name: Hide
choices.tip: Hide in a cowardly fashion.  This will protect you from damage but doesn't help anyone else.

choices.name: Mystery Action!
choices.tip: Do something odd.  No telling what will happen if you do...

choices.name: Industrious
choices.tip: Boosts the building and harvesting effectiveness of everyone at the same building as you.

choices.name: Aggressive
choices.tip: Increases the activating effectiveness of everyone at the same building as you.

choices.name: Defensive
choices.tip: Improves the defense of everyone at the same building as you.

choices.name: Soothing
choices.tip: Boosts the effective of healing for everyone at the same building as you.

choices.name: Acquisitive
choices.tip: Increases the amount of resources people get from treats they collect for everyone at the same building as you.

choices.name: Stylish
choices.tip: Improves the effectiveness of equipment for the turn for everyone at the same building as you.
